summary: A Powerful Spell that prevents the Wielder from all forms of magical harm.
descriptionHtml:
This Plugin adds a very powerful Ward Spell that will never break whilst activated. The spell\'s tome can be purchased from Enthir (a mage located in the Hall of Attainment, College of Winterhold)

There are two versions of the Mod:
- One is for Mages with a large amount of Magicka and skilled in Restoration.
                                
- The other plugin is more of a cheat spell, as it doesn\'t drain magicka.

If you have any advice or suggestions on how to alter this mod, leave a comment or PM me.
author: Kingy

files.name: Indomitable Ward Spell - No Magicka Cost
files.fileName: Indomitable Ward Spell - No Magicka Cost-18367-1-1.zip
